gameDetails.name: Witch's Brew: The 6th Player & The Amulets & The Magical Abilities
gameDetails.description:
Expansion I, The 6th player:
Note that you can also use this expansion with less than 6 players.

Expansion II, The Amulets:
This expansion increases the tension and the excitement, in particular with 3 players.

Expansion III, Magic Powers:
With this expansion the choice of role cards at the beginning of each round is now more important and require more planning.

This expansion has not been released separately, but can be found in the Treasure Chest.
